mapper.select: select * from bannerad WHERE status=#{status} order by revise_date DESC LIMIT 4
mapper.insert: insert into bannerad(img, reg_date, revise_date, status) VALUES (#{img}, #{reg_date}, #{revise_date}, #{status})
mapper.update: update bannerad SET img=#{img}, status=#{status}, revise_date=#{revise_date}
